metadata.synopsis: Two goofy would-be gunslingers (Terence Hill, Bud Spencer) side with Mormon settlers against Mexican bandits.

reviews: The movie is a spoof of the traditional 1960s spaghetti Western. In fact, it is to spaghetti as spaghetti is to macaroni and cheese, a dish I have particularly disliked ever since the meat rationing days of World War II.
It's so outrageously awful that it might click.
